description: Evil Lord Li Zong had wanted to refine the four supreme dragon souls to break through his own realm, but he never expected that he would bring the power of the four supreme dragon souls back to three thousand years ago when he was a teenager! He had killed all his enemies in advance in his previous life that he had not been able to avenge in his previous life, and he had been unable to posture in time. He would offer everything he had in this life!>
